data.text: Yoinega na wayage kozahila gaja gomnogeza heyo mwenyego,
Mbozi hanogelwa na nzewele,
Munhu yehile yaheza, kokwiza na bezi,
Mbuli za munhu kamba kisima cha mazi,
Havinogile kulola kihanga cha munhu yehile mkitala,
Mbuli za mbozi zogala ndwagi,
Mulomo wa mbozi ombananga mwenyego,
Mbuli za kidelenya kamba ndiya inogile,
Munhu mnyeke mzisang'hano zake,
Twaga da Mndewa Imulungu ayo ngome igangamale,
Munhu mgoli kogizaga vinhu viyeli navo ayo ngome yake,
Kuitapa kwa moyo kogala kunangigwa,
Heyo yokwidika bila kutegeleza,
Loho ya munhu yodaha kusitamili utamu,
Moyo wa munhu mwene nzewele olonda kutanga vinhu ng'hani,
Nhunza yomvugulila munhu milango,
Munhu wa ichanduso kusonga kuiyalala kokoneka kana haki,
Kubwanha simbi kosegesa kuibamilila,
Ndugu yatendeligwe gehile mdala kubanza buga dizungulusiligwe luwa,
Inda ya munhu yokwiguta mbuli zilawa mmulomo wake,
Lulimi luna udahi wa kugala ifa na ugima,
Munhu yozahila mwehe kozahila kinhu kinogile,
Mkiwa kopula kwa uhole,
Mbwiga wengi odaha kumbananga munhu,
